title: niunai
author: niunai
content: The founding purpose of liesnfts is to make NFT no longer the patent of a certain group of people, reduce NFT scams, and be a real NFT communicator.liesnfts can now be purchased for zero yuan on opensea, and you only need to pay a small gas fee to own liesnft.The liesnfts project party promises that any holder of liesnft can sell to the project party at the initial purchase price, and the liesnft project party promises to repurchase liesnft forever.Holders of liesnfts can permanently participate in the dividends of liesnft procedures, and the number of liesnfts is constant, with a total of 10,000.The initial sale price of liesnfts will continue to increase as the quantity decreases, and the specific increase rate depends on the situation.How to judge the quality and importance of liesnft:number of lines > colorNumber of lines: fewer lines > more linesColor: Color>Red>Orange>Yellow>Green>Cyan>Blue>Purple>Special case: when the number of lines coincides with the background color, its value is greater than that of liesnft of the same level.We believe that with liesnft, you are the brightest boy in the nft world.Currently we have opened the initial 100 liesnft purchase channels, if you are interested, please visit https://opensea.io/collection/liesnftsOur official website: www.liesnft.topAt the same time, if you have other better suggestions or want to join our team, please contact 18290258884@163.com .you can call him x, let's do something different.
